item.title: My First Post - Edited in vim
item.author: Author
item.description: First Post Intro As the first post, I will try to explain to myself the reason for opening this blog. The most important one I guess - to write things. Practice my written expression capabilities. After years of journaling, I understand that knowing that what you write is publib makes a difference on the outcome. The main topics I’d like to tackle here are: Tech Books Personal insights and questions
